## TelemetryOptions.instrumentation property

Specifies which telemetry export provider to use. The value specified here must match the id of a {<!-- -->TelemetryConfig<!-- -->} provided by an installed plugin.

Note: Telemetry data is only exported when running in the `prod` environment.

**Signature:**

```typescript
instrumentation: string;
```
